description: An error report about an Inventory record set that had one or more errors during upsert or delete.

id.description: Unique ID (uuid) for this error report.

harvestJobId.description: Identifier (uuid) of the harvest job run creating the error report

harvestableId.description: Identifier (numeric) of the harvest configuration (harvestable), by which the job was run.

harvestableName.description: Name of the harvest configuration (harvestable), by which the job was run.

recordErrors.description: List of errors encountered during upsert or delete.

items.description: Report of an error encountered during upsert or delete.

typeOfRecord.description: The type of entity affected by the error, i.e. 'HOLDINGS_RECORD'.

transaction.description: The type of transaction performed when the error occurred.

message.description: Error message produced by the backend component reporting the error.

entity.description: The JSON object entity that encountered an error - ie. a holdingsRecord JSON.

original.description: I.e. the XML of the incoming record before transformation to an Inventory record set.

transformedRecord.description: The JSON outcome of the transformation of the original record.

timeStamp.description: The time the error occurred, Day Mon DD HH24:mi:ss TZ yyyy

recordNumber.description: The identifier assigned to this error report by Harvester
